subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Craig Bellamy scored against his former club in the 74th minute, and Liverpool advanced to the English League Cup final with a 2-2 tie against visiting Manchester City on Wednesday and a 3-2 aggregate win.
snippet: Craig Bellamy scored against his former club in the 74th minute, and Liverpool advanced to the English League Cup final with a 2-2 tie against visiting Manchester City on Wednesday and a 3-2 aggregate win.
